Text:
thank You for FINALLY releasing an AMW after like 10 missed episodes or so, You guys have no idea how thankful I am. it is kinda cheesy, i admit that, but i love the show nonetheless, esp. stoned.

PLEASE KEEP RELEASING AMW!!!

still seeding this episode but there must be 7-8 new episodes by now that for some reason havent gotten the attention of ANY of the torrent groups. why is that??? i mean, amw is reasonably popular and there are people who cant watch it for the sole reason of living in Europe.

PLEASE RELEASE NEW AMW EPISODES!
THANK YOU IN ADVANCE!
